params._receiver: address of the user who will receive the assets
params._shares: amount of shares the user wants to convert

params._userCharityYieldRatio: Ratio of user to charity yield

_deposit(uint256).notice: function to deposit assets and receive vault tokens in exchange

_withdraw(uint256,address).notice: Function to allow msg.sender to redeem their deposit plus accrued interest

assetsPerShare().notice: Return the amount of assets per 1 (1e18) share

harvestYield().notice: Function to harvest the yield and transfer it to the charity address

setUserCharityYieldRatio(uint256).notice: Set the user to charity yield ratio

shareHolder(address).notice: A mapping that checks if a user has deposited the token

speedrunYield().notice: Helper function to artificially inflate underlying asset balance to facilitate the demonstration of the yield stripping

totalAssets().notice: Return the amount of assets in the vault

totalAssetsOfUser(address).notice: Return the amount of assets owned by a user

userCharityYieldRatio().notice: Ratio of user to charity yield
